participant_1.background:
I was a personal chef before I started my own meatloaf catering business.
i like to stay fit.
I have a dog and a cat, both of whom are very well-behaved.
I like my job, but I don't have a lot of family support.
I am short for my age, but I am strong and fit.

participant_2.background:
I met my family through adoption, and I am so grateful to have them in my life.
I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.
I run for my mom.
i like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items.
I tore my ACL while racing go carts and couldn't race for the rest of the season.

content.text: Hey there! I'm doing great, thanks for asking!
That's good to hear. So, what's your favorite kind of meatloaf?
I really like meatloaf with a lot of veggies in it.
Me too! I like to add carrots, celery, and onions.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go running, go to concerts, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like great ways to spend your time. I love to run too!
Me too! It's a great way to stay fit and clear your head.
I agree! So, what's your favorite Taylor Swift song?
I love "All Too Well." It's so relatable.
Me too! I love the lyrics.
So, what's your favorite thing about your family?
I love that they're always there for me.
That's so great! My family is my everything.
Me too! So, what's your favorite item that you've made from thrift shop finds?
I love the purses that I've made
